answers.answer: Hey Naiomi!Gestational diabetes is not related to fetal teratogenic effects. While a few minor abnormalities may be associated these are relatively rarer, if the blood sugar levels are appropriately controlled. I would suggest discussing the situation and the suggested management plan in detail with your treating gynecologist/ endocrinologist.Hope this is helpful.Take care!
